import './ExpenseItem.css' import ExpenseDate from "./ExpenseDate" import Card from "../UI/Card" import React, {useState} from 'react' let ExpenseItem = (props) => { const onClickHandler =()=>{ let title =props.title title="updarted" console.log(title) } return (

{props.title}

${props.amount}
 ) } export default ExpenseItem
